name: The Quest of The Golden Shovel
name_original: The Quest of The Golden Shovel
description:
In this game, you are given a shovel to start your journey.

You are accompanied by your cat - Chip, who you can feed, pet and talk to.

You need to enter mines/caves to find ores in dirt piles using your shovel. You can then go on to sell this ore and earn a profit to upgrade your shovel.

Better shovel - more expensive ore - more money - better shovel

The ultimate goal of the game is to obtain the Golden shovel.

Features:

  • A cute cat that follows you everywhere!
  • An advanced mining system!
  • No bugs! (def not true)

This game was made for the 2023 Mini Jame Gam.
